com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Interface LocalRotations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PresetRotations

    public interface LocalRotations
    Represents a graph Vertex - v and a set of DirectedEdges (a, b). All DirectedEdges are virtually connected to the center Vertex (virtual DirectedEdges (v, a)).

    Virtual DirectedEdges (v, a) are ordered by the clockwise order of as around v. The order of virtual DirectedEdges is used to establish edges(), which returns CompoundEdges v, (a, b).

    Next DirectedEdge of (a, b) is a DirectedEdge (c, d). c comes strictly after a in the clockwise order of virtual DirectedEdges - (v, a) < (v, c).

    Definitions:

     v ... the center vertex of this LocalRotations
 a ... the source vertex of a DirectedEdge; virtually connected to v
 b ... the destination vertex of a DirectedEdge; virtually connected to v
 c ... the source vertex of the first DirectedEdge after (a, b); virtually
       connected to v
 d ... the destination vertex of the first DirectedEdge after (a, b);
       virtually connected to v

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<CompoundEdge> edges()
      Returns CompoundEdges v, (a, b).
      CompoundEdge next(DirectedEdge current)
      Returns the first CompoundEdge after current in this LocalRotations.
      LocalRotations with(DirectedEdge... additionalEdges)
      Returns new LocalRotations with an additionalEdges.
      LocalRotations without(DirectedEdge... surplusEdges)
      Returns new LocalRotations without the surplusEdges.

    • Method Detail

      • edges

        List<CompoundEdge> edges()
        Returns CompoundEdges v, (a, b).

        Refer to Definitions in the interface definition Doc for more info.

        Returns:
        a list of CompoundEdges v, (a, b)

      • next

        CompoundEdge next(DirectedEdge current)
        Returns the first CompoundEdge after current in this LocalRotations.

        current need not be a part of this LocalRotations.

        Refer to Definitions in the interface definition Doc for more info.

        Parameters:
        current - DirectedEdge (a, b)
        Returns:
        a new CompoundEdge v (c, d)

      • with

        LocalRotations with(DirectedEdge... additionalEdges)
        Returns new LocalRotations with an additionalEdges.

        Refer to Definitions in the interface definition Doc for more info.

        Parameters:
        additionalEdges - the DirectedEdges (a, b) to add
        Returns:
        new LocalRotations with additionalEdges

      • without

        LocalRotations without(DirectedEdge... surplusEdges)
        Returns new LocalRotations without the surplusEdges.

        Refer to Definitions in the interface definition Doc for more info.

        Parameters:
        surplusEdges - the DirectedEdges (a, b) to remove
        Returns:
        new LocalRotations without the surplusEdges
